problem.markdown:
>>Indicate if the following types of solar energy are passive or active.<<
Large windows on the south side of a building (in the Northern Hemisphere): [[active, (passive)]] Solar photovoltaic panels on the roof of a building: [[(active), passive]] Parabolic mirror systems to heat water in a tower: [[(active), passive]]
[explanation] Passive solar applications such as windows do not require active technology. Active solar applications such as PV panels and parabolic mirror systems use a variety of technologies. [explanation]
